p:
Participants were asked their self-identified gender, race, age, years of education, the stability of their current housing, income, and employment status. We also administered the Centers for Epidemiological Studies Depression scale to assess symptoms of depression (alpha = 0.87) and the 3-item consumption subscale of the Alcohol Use Disorders Identification Test (AUDIT-C).
24, 25 To assess food insecurity, we used items adapted from the US Food Security Scale that have been validated in the past research and used by the US Census Bureau.
26
